ability.Energy Overflow: Each turn, this Pokemon's Speed increases by 1 stage. If its HP drops below 1/3, its Special Attack increases by 2 stages instead.
ability.Guts: If this Pokemon is statused, its Special Attack is 1.5x; ignores burn halving physical damage.

Dragon Laser.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.

Explosive Blast.effect: Has a 20% chance to burn the target.

Roost.effect: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP.

Flare Cascade.effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
